                            [ G a m e   N o t e s ]

   

   You never know when it will happen unless you make a few special
   arrangements. Because once the Hitman takes the assignment, someone takes
   a fall. It's not a righteous way of life, but everyone has to make a living.
   A globe-trotting action game that evolves over five chapters of self
   discovery, and ultimate revenge. Planning, recon, and execution with minimal
   risk.
   

   Features:

   - Ground-breaking 3D engine offering full object physics, deformations.
   - Fascinating and original plot.
   - Living NPCs that exist independently of the main character.
   - Rewards for stealth and sophisticated planning.
   - Pervasive and involving realism.
   - Glacier, a powerful new gaming engine.
   - Glide and OpenGL support.
   - 26 missions in the streets and buildings of five major world cities.
